CatDescriptText: Cutline of related article published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, June 15, 1963, pg. 15 reads: "The 1963 Courier-WAMO Home_A-Rama, Pittsburgh's only home and food show, opened before a huge throng last Thursday, June 6, at the spacious Syria Mosque in Oakland."
TitMainTitle: Men, including disc jockey Porky Chedwick on microphone, in WAMO Broadcast Booth, with Mary Lou Williams records on display, in Syria Mosque for the 1963 Courier-Wamo Home-A-Rama
